        public void drawButton(double b,
                       int startingB,
                       int currentValue,
                       double button1RatioX,
                       double button1RatioY,
                       double button11RatioX,
                       double button12RatioX,
                       double button13RatioX,
                       CanvasDrawer canvas)
        Draws 4 part button
        Parameters:
        b - number of gap between indexes
        startingB - starting index position
        currentValue - current value
        button1RatioX - x coordinate ratio for canvas width
        button1RatioY - y coordinate ratio for canvas height
        button11RatioX - x coordinate ratio for canvas width
        button12RatioX - x coordinate ratio for canvas width
        button13RatioX - x coordinate ratio for canvas width
        canvas - CanvasDrawer Object
